Title: Trump sets new tariff rates and deadlines. And, rabbis speak out on starvation in Gaza
Description:
Trump signed executive orders setting updated tariff rates on more than 65 countries.
And, more than 1,000 rabbis and Jewish leaders signed a public letter decrying starvation in Gaza.

Title: Fourth Milwaukee hotel worker accused in D’Vontaye Mitchell’s death pleads guilty to felony murder
Description: The last of four Milwaukee hotel workers accused of killing a man by pinning him to the ground has pleaded guilty to being a party to felony murder.

Title: Boca Raton to begin automated speed enforcement in certain school zones this fall
Description: Boca Raton officials plan to deploy automated speed cameras in school zones this fall to curb speeding and enhance safety during school hours.

Title: EA Isn't Considering The Sims 5 Right Now Because 'It's Not Player-Friendly' To Expect Fans To 'Give Up All of the Content That You’ve Purchased Over the Years'
Description: EA has opened up about the fate of its hugely popular The Sims franchise, offering a sneaky tease about what to expect from the upcoming multiplayer game, and why we probably shouldn't expect The Sims 5 any time soon.

Title: How did Facebook intercept competitor's encrypted mobile app traffic? (2014)

Title: U.S. Science Has Weathered Attacks Before and Won
